text:
Net operating income (NOI) is calculated after the deduction for real estate taxes
but before any relevant income taxes. This ratio, which is typically between one
and two, indicates greater protection to the lender when it is higher. Debt service
coverage ratios below one indicate that the borrower is not generating sufficient cash
low to make the debt payments and is likely to default. Remember: the higher the
better for this ratio from the perspective of the lender and the MBS investor.
